answers.answer: Yes it happend to me with my first pregnancy...but it happend after giving birth ..it was weird i was feeling good and then just went up crazy i got 3 ceazures....my husband saw it said it was scary. .thank god iam alive and i stayed for like a month in the hospital......it was scary thats how my body react
But dont worry if they detected you on time its good ..they will help u stay health.....once the bany is born u will not get it

Yikes! That is very scary... I was the same way,I felt perfectly fine. It was just a routine prenatal visit and everyone started being really concerned and said I needed to be admitted. I was like but I feel fine. Well hopefully all goes well today and it was just a fluke.Thanks for your response

Happened to me with my other two pregnancies. As soon as I had my boys the high blood pressure went away. I got induced with both of them and it was fine. With my first I got induced on my due date and the other I was induced 3 weeks early. This one I will be going early too just not sure on when yet.

question: I'm 37 weeks today and a few days ago was told that I had gestational hypertension. They were able to get my blood pressure down to allow me to go home but said I needed to come back to do more tests to monitor for preeclampsia. Because I'm now 37 weeks if my blood pressure is high again today they said they will induce me. I'm so so nervous. Has this happened to anyone else?
title: gestational hypertension :/
